nodes.text: Guy Domville Siner (born October 16, 1947) is an American actor who provided voices for several Star Wars video games. He is best known for playing Lieutenant Hubert Gruber in the televison series 'Allo 'Allo!
He is also known to sci-fi fans for appearing in Doctor Who in the story Genesis of the Daleks.
